BlackBox.name: Clash.Explicit.Signal.unsafeSynchronizer
BlackBox.type:
unsafeSynchronizer
  :: ( KnownDomain dom1 conf1    -- ARG[0]
     , KnownDomain dom2 conf2 )  -- ARG[1]
  => Clock dom1                  -- ARG[2]
  -> Clock dom2                  -- ARG[3]
  -> Signal dom1 a               -- ARG[4]
  -> Signal dom2 a
